content:
@Amol Vyas (Cambia) - Ryan's announcement of the IG this week attracted some review, which has picked up some issues in the spec.

  • the spec does not have a any status message to indicate that it's a work in progress. Please add a publish box (see https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179165-committers channel)

  • the spec presently includes both a FHIR icon, and an HL7 icon. The HL7 icon can only be used by HL7 or accelerator projects, and the FHIR icon can only be used by HL7, accelerator projects, or requires written permission, which has not been done in this case

Ryan hasn't signed up as an accelerator project (yet)... so you might ask him what his plans are, and if he's not going to do that quickly, it would be good to remove the icons until he does
http://www.hl7.org/about/fhiraccelerator/ and the HL7 press release from February made me think this was established.
@Ryan Howells just want to make sure you are following the discussion here!
Still relevant re: the rest of the discussion in this channel :)
well, the icon question at least has gone away. But the status box thing is still relevant
I'm following now. We can add the status box. I saw your reference @Grahame Grieve. @Amol Vyas (Cambia) can you make sure we add the status box to the IG?

It's there now:

http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/

pasted image

Thanks @Grahame Grieve and @Josh Mandel . As you might know, we're using the Trifolia-on-FHIR tool for IG authoring. While I did add explicit DRAFT verbiage on the version and home page, I must give credit to the tool for generating the status box. I am also investigating if there is a way to customize the text within the status box from the tool.

It would be good if it's not there twice (we've gone form 0 to 2...). The top one is the one that must be present and who's content is driven by the IG publisher. The second is presumably inserted by trifolia, and they should remove it.
@Sean McIlvenna , @Rick Geimer: Could you please help?

As mentioned on the https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2019-09+CARIN+Blue+Button about, Scenario Step 1 (Sandbox user retrieves EOBs from the Sandbox server using the Client app). Which sandbox do I have to utilize to accomplish Scenario Step 1?
I don't think there's currently a sandbox with sample data, because I don't think there's currently any sample data.
